title: Servicenow Developer
description:
**APN Consulting has an immediate need for a direct client requirement:**  

  

**Role : ServiceNow ITOM / CMDB developer**  

**Location: Remote.**  

  

**5-6 of experience in ITOM CMDB**
* As a ServiceNow ITOM CMDB (Configuration Management Database) Developer, your primary responsibility revolves around configuring, customizing, and maintaining the CMDB within the ServiceNow platform. Here's a breakdown of key responsibilities and tasks associated with this role:
* Configuration Management: Implementing and maintaining the Configuration Management process within ServiceNow ITOM, ensuring that all configuration items (CIs) are properly identified, documented, and managed.
* CMDB Configuration: Designing and configuring the CMDB schema, classes, and relationships to accurately represent the organization's IT infrastructure, including hardware, software, networks, and services.
* Data Normalization and Enrichment: Developing normalization and reconciliation rules to ensure data accuracy and consistency within the CMDB. Enriching CI records with additional attributes and relationships to provide comprehensive insights into IT assets and dependencies.
* Integration with Discovery Tools: Integrating ServiceNow CMDB with ITOM Discovery tools (such as ServiceNow Discovery or third-party discovery tools) to automatically populate and update CI information, ensuring CMDB accuracy and completeness.
* Change Management Integration: Collaborating with Change Management teams to ensure that CMDB updates are properly documented and validated through the Change Management process, maintaining data integrity and compliance.
* CI Relationship Mapping: Defining and maintaining relationships between CIs within the CMDB, including dependencies, associations, and impact analysis to support Incident, Problem, and Change Management processes.
* Reporting and Visualization: Developing reports, dashboards, and visualizations to provide insights into CMDB health, compliance, and configuration trends. Utilizing ServiceNow reporting and analytics capabilities to monitor CMDB performance and identify improvement opportunities.
* Governance and Compliance: Enforcing CMDB governance policies and standards to ensure data quality, accuracy, and compliance with industry regulations and best practices (e.g., ITIL, ISO 20000).
* Continuous Improvement: Identifying areas for CMDB optimization and enhancement, such as automation of CI discovery and reconciliation processes, streamlining data normalization, and improving data visualization for better decision-making.
* Documentation and Training: Documenting CMDB configurations, processes, and best practices for reference by administrators and users. Providing training and support to IT teams on CMDB usage, data entry, and maintenance procedures.

title: IT Engineer
description:
**Job Summary**

As a member of the Data Center Services Operation team, the Operations Engineer will be responsible for carrying out activities that combine analytical and design skills with adequate knowledge of software and hardware technology to define, design, implement, test, deploy, and modify Emerson's VMware/Virtualization, Storage, Data Protection, Windows, and Linux infrastructure to produce and implement functional solutions that meet predefined requirements or organizational needs. This person will also be responsible for administering, monitoring, maintaining performance, ensuring security, applying patches, and fixing the infrastructure


**In this Role, Your Responsibilities Will Be:**

* Installing, configuring, and maintaining hardware, operating systems, and software applications on servers. Supporting VMware/Virtualization, Cloud, Storage, Data Protection, Windows, and Linux infrastructure, including all related administration aspects.
* Performing periodic system maintenance tasks, including software updates, patches, and firmware upgrades.
* Monitoring system performance, resource utilization, and capacity planning.
* Resolving hardware and software issues in a timely manner.
* Performing periodic patching and applying appropriate security updates.
* Establishing and adhering to backup and disaster recovery procedures.
* Work on multiple cloud environment (Microsoft Azure, Oracle Cloud etc.) to manage infrastructure.
* Managing user accounts, permissions, and access control.
* Providing technical support and assistance in troubleshooting customer issues.
* Evaluating and recommending system upgrades, new technologies, and software/hardware solutions.
* Planning and implementing system migrations, integrations, and expansions.
* Collaborating with vendors and IT team members to implement new systems and technologies.
* Creating and maintaining documentation, including system configurations, procedures, and troubleshooting guides.
* Generating reports on system performance, incidents, and security events.
* Collaborating with other IT team members, such as network administrators, database administrators, and developers.
* Keeping up-to-date knowledge of emerging technologies, trends, and standard methodologies in system administration.
* Ensuring compliance with company audit and security policies and procedures.
* Developing and implementing scripts and automation tools for repetitive administrative tasks.
* Automating system maintenance tasks and monitoring processes.
* Improving system efficiency and productivity through scripting and automation.
* Diagnosing and resolving hardware and software issues for VMware/Virtualization, Storage, Data Protection, Windows, and Linux infrastructure.
* Supporting x86 blade servers and rack-mountable servers. Installing, fixing, and replacing hardware and firmware as needed.
* Advancing complex issues to the appropriate teams or vendors when necessary.
* Using change and incident management systems to ensure enterprise-level system availability.
* Performing any other tasks assigned by the direct supervisor or management related to job responsibilities or legal compliance.

**Who You Are:**

You show a tremendous amount of initiative in tough situations; are exceptional at spotting and seizing opportunities. You observe situational and group dynamics and select best-fit approach. You make implementation plans that allocate resources precisely. You pursue everything with energy, drive, and the need to finish.


**For This Role, You Will Need:**

* 4+ years of hands-on experience as a System Administrator, with specialized knowledge and practical experience in running **Commvault backup** solutions, Windows/Linux environments, and VMware virtualization technologies.
* Demonstrated expertise in **Commvault backup and recovery solutions** , including installation, configuration, and administration of Commvault environments for data protection and disaster recovery.
* Strong proficiency in **VMware technologies** , particularly VMware vSphere, encompassing installation, configuration, and maintenance of virtualized environments.
* Proficiency in **Windows/Linux server administration** , encompassing installation, configuration, and maintenance of Windows/Linux servers across various versions (Windows Server 2012, 2016, 2019).
* Familiarity with VMware Cloud Foundation (VCF), including its components and capabilities, for automating and managing software-defined data centers.
* Experience working in an operational IT environment that applies ticketing and problem management systems (e.g., ServiceNow, Jira) for incident and changes.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to solve complex technical issues in a Windows and cloud environment.
* Superb communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team-oriented environment.

**Preferred Qualifications that Set You Apart:**

* Certification(s) in relevant technologies, such as Microsoft Certified: Windows Server and VMware Certified Professional (VCP), are preferred. **Commvault certification (e.g., Commvault Certified Specialist) is also desirable.**
* Knowledge of hybrid cloud architectures and solutions for integrating on-premises and cloud environments.

**Our Offer to You:**

By joining Emerson, you will be given the opportunity to make a difference through the work you do.


Emerson's compensation and benefits programs are designed to be **driven within the industry and local labor markets** . We also offer a **comprehensive medical and insurance coverage** to meet the needs of our employees.

We attract, develop, and retain exceptional people in an inclusive environment, where all **employees can reach their greatest potential** . We are dedicated to the ongoing development of our employees because we know that it is critical to our success as a global company.


We have established our Remote Work Policy for eligible roles to promote **Work-Life Balance** through a hybrid work set up where our team members can take advantage of working both from home and at the office.


Safety is paramount to us, and we are steadfast in our pursuit to provide a **Safe Working Environment** across our global network and facilities.


Through our benefits, development opportunities, and an inclusive and safe work environment, we aim to create an organization our people are proud to represent.


Our Commitment to Diversity & Inclusion


At Emerson, we are committed to fostering a culture where every employee is valued and respected for their unique experiences and perspectives. We believe a diverse and inclusive work environment contributes to the rich exchange of ideas and diversity of thoughts, that inspires innovation and brings the best solutions to our customers.


This philosophy is fundamental to living our company’s values and our responsibility to leave the world in a better place. Learn more about our Culture & Values and about Diversity, Equity & Inclusion at Emerson.

title: Virtualization Engineer
description:
A Digital Workspace Virtualization Engineer is an experienced and accomplished virtualization expert contributing to a dynamic, infrastructure design team making a difference. The position’s primary technology focus is on-premises virtualization along with a growing hybrid cloud. The goal is to execute architectural directives and ensure 24x7x365 virtual infrastructure availability for an energy efficient semiconductor company. The Digital Workspace Virtualization Engineer role requires versatility along with initiative. The ideal candidate will know how to think “outside-the-box” and will share in responsibilities implementing, enhancing, and supporting the provisioning, configuration and management of enterprise infrastructure running in a hybrid cloud environment. The Digital Workspace Virtualization Engineer will work closely with architects, infrastructure team members, and application developers. Adhering to industry best practices to support onsemi’s business objectives and user community experience is of utmost importance.


**PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES:**

* Implements and supports on-premises virtual infrastructure solutions (compute, systems hardware, distributed systems management, disaster recovery, security)
* Mentors and assists global VMware support team
* Tier 3 escalation for investigating, troubleshooting, and resolving complex virtual infrastructure related issues in production
* Capacity planning to provide analysis and decision support modeling
* Monitoring, ongoing performance tuning, resource optimization, and delivering improvement recommendations to respective infrastructure teams
* Passionate about cloud computing technologies, understanding business drivers, and emerging trends
* Executes efficient life cycle management methodologies of network, storage and compute virtual infrastructure with an “automation only” mindset
* Experience with hybrid cloud solutions (automation and orchestration, cloud management, cloud native apps)
* Leads focused activities to improve availability and efficiency for critical onsemi environments
* Experience generating useful report metrics and analytics on the health of virtual and hybrid cloud platforms
* Coordinates meetings and communicates with non-technical staff on project requests
* Ensures compliance to IT general controls and company working rules

**REQUIREMENTS:**

Years of experience: Minimum of 5 years’ experience in virtualization infrastructure and systems engineering


Education: Bachelor's degree (or equivalent work experience) from a regionally accredited institution in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems, Information Sciences, Information Technology, or Software Engineering


Certification: At least one, preferably two or more of the following certifications: VMware VCP, VCAP; Microsoft MSCE, Microsoft Azure Administrator


Communication: Fluent English (written and verbal)


**REQUIRED EXPERIENCE**

* VMware expertise: 5+ years vSphere & vCenter enterprise experience with at least 100 hosts and 2,000 virtual machines
* At least 2 years’ experience with VMware Cloud Foundation including NSX and vSAN
* Extensive experience implementing VMware infrastructure “blueprints”
* vSphere virtual machine performance optimization
* Advanced proficiency (7+ years) with Linux and/or Windows administration/engineering in an enterprise environment
* Proficiency with Microsoft Active Directory
* Strong knowledge of and use with storage protocols including iSCSI, Fibre Channel, and NFS in conjunction with datastores
* vSphere/vCenter SSL certificate implementation and management experience in an enterprise environment
* Zero trust security focused
* At least 2 years’ experience with disaster recovery implementation and management
* Infrastructure automation experience using Ansible, Terraform, PowerShell, Puppet, Chef, or other similar languages
* Effective communication of complex virtualization/hybrid cloud concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences
* Highly self-motivated and directed with a keen attention to detail and willingness to assume responsibility
* An openness to see problems or issues from various angles and a willingness to discuss and vet solutions until a common goal or idea is agreed upon
* Flexibility to adapt and adjust as required until the business needs are met
* Strong understanding of systems architecture from the application through infrastructure stack
* Excellent problem solving and decision-making skills
* Familiarity with agile project management techniques

  
**onsemi** (Nasdaq: ON) is driving disruptive innovations to help build a better future. With a focus on automotive and industrial end-markets, the company is accelerating change in megatrends such as vehicle electrification and safety, sustainable energy grids, industrial automation, and 5G and cloud infrastructure. With a highly differentiated and innovative product portfolio, onsemi creates intelligent power and sensing technologies that solve the world’s most complex challenges and leads the way in creating a safer, cleaner, and smarter world.  

  

  

More details about our company benefits can be found here:
https://www.onsemi.com/careers/career-benefits
  
We are committed to sourcing, attracting, and hiring high-performance innovators, while providing all candidates a positive recruitment experience that builds our brand as a great place to work.

title: Software Architect
description:
NTT is a leading global IT solutions and services organisation that brings together people, data and things to create a better and more sustainable future.


In today’s ‘iNTTerconnected’ world, connections matter more now than ever. By bringing together talented people, world-class technology partners and emerging innovators, we help our clients solve some of the world’s most significant technological, business and societal challenges.


With people at the heart of our success, NTT is committed to attracting and growing the best talent and providing an environment where everyone feels they can belong and their contribution matters.

 **Want to be a part of our team?**


The role joining Global Technology Services is part of the Service Division Managed Network and Collaboration Services (MNCS) in the sub-division Digital Collaboration Services (DCS).
  

  

https://services.global.ntt/en-us/services-and-products/digital-collaboration
  

  

The role is primarily pre-sales technical support for the development and implementation of complex products/applications/solutions. Uses in-depth product knowledge to provide technical expertise to global sales, architects and the customer through sales presentations and product demonstrations. Assists sales in assessing potential application of company products to meet customer needs and may prepare detailed product specifications for the implementation of solutions and services.**Working at NTT**


The primary responsibility of the Architect is to consult with the client and work with internal teams to create strategies, transformational designs and the architectural vision for complex solutions that address the clients’ needs. They provide multi-technology consulting services on all aspects of application software, infrastructure, and related technology components.


You bring the knowledge of a product or service to the required crafting of a technical solution(s) in support of NTT clients. They have a strong understanding of the Organisation thereby ensuring that their crafted solution(s) meet client requirements.


You will have the opportunity to design solutions with some of the most innovative global organizations, technologies, accelerating the digital transformation business objectives and outcomes.

**Key roles and responsibilities:**

* Collaborate with sales and solutions teams to identify customer requirements and develop technical proposals and solutions.
* Lead technical discussions with customers to understand their business and technical requirements and provide guidance and recommendations on technology solutions.
* Design and develop technical architecture blueprints for collaboration technology solutions such as Cisco Webex and Microsoft Teams, including high-level and detailed design documents, technology roadmaps, and implementation plans.
* Support the sales teams in presenting an architecture solution to clients with a focus on cost savings or uncovering other client growth opportunities. This will require an ability to discover and analyse the client’s current architecture, platforms, and operating models.
* Stay up to date with the latest trends and developments in collaboration technologies and provide thought leadership to customers and the team.
* Work with the delivery team to ensure successful implementation and deployment of collaboration technology solutions.
* Participate in knowledge sharing and training activities to improve team skills and capabilities.
* Utilize value selling methodologies to demonstrate the value of collaboration technology solutions to customers and prospects.
* Collaborate with sales teams to identify customer business challenges and develop use cases to showcase how collaboration technology solutions can address those challenges and deliver tangible business outcomes.
* Ensure that any form of design or bill of materials is aligned to the product portfolio and is constructed to meet both technical requirements but also considers customer budget and commercial value.
* Ensures that any statement of work/proposed solution customer document output is completed to a sufficient level of quality to ensure the project meets the customer needs, but also can be costed to ensure successful and profitable delivery.
* Provide enablement and support to other architects within the organization to build their skills and capabilities in collaboration technology solutions.
* Support comprehensive and compelling RFP, RFI and RFQ in a timely, accurate manner, ensuring alignment to our strategic objectives and values.
* Develop and maintain best practices, methodologies, and standards for collaboration technology solutions to ensure consistency and quality across pipeline opportunities.
* Participate in governance processes to ensure assurance and compliance across pipeline opportunities, including reviewing proposals and technical designs for adherence to standards and requirements.
* Develop and deliver product demonstrations to customers and prospects to showcase the capabilities and benefits of collaboration technology solutions.
* Work closely with product development teams to provide feedback on customer needs and industry trends to inform product roadmap decisions.

**Knowledge, skills, and attributes**

* Strong knowledge of Microsoft: Teams, SharePoint, Exchange, OneDrive, Stream, Graph API, Entra, Office, Certified Microsoft Devices, Licensing.
* Desirable Knowledge of Microsoft: Power Platform, Dynamics, Windows, Purview, Intune, Defender. Azure
* Strong knowledge of Cisco: Unified Communications Manager, Webex Shared Calling, Webex Dedicated Instance, Webex Contact Center, Collaboration Endpoints, Licensing.
* Good knowledge on SIP protocol and Session Border Controllers AudioCodes, Oracle, Ribbon, Cisco as well as telco integrations for PSTN.
* Detailed knowledge of Managed Services service and delivery models, including cloud, global, and distributed delivery models.


Desirable working relationships and knowledge for the following vendors/products: Genesys, Nice, Luware, ASC, Dubber, Poly, Logi, Crestron, Yealink, Jabra, Spectralink, AudioCodes, Oracle, Ribbon, Algo.

* Proven experience in enterprise architecture and pre-sales activities, with a focus on collaboration, communications, productivity, workplace technology solutions.
* Strong technical skills and experience in designing and implementing collaboration technology solutions.
* Desirable skills and experience with identity protection, information protection, threat protection, security management, and data governance features in Microsoft 365
* Understanding of Network Topology and in particular SD-WAN/MPLS architecture, networking concepts and tools, such as VPN, DNS, load balancing, and firewalls.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to articulate complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to think creatively and strategically.
* Ability to manage multiple priorities and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

**Academic qualifications and certifications:**


Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Information Technology or Commence etc.

* Preferable Microsoft 365 Certification: MS700 - Teams Administrator Associate
* Desirable Microsoft 365 Certifications: MS-500, MS-900, MS-203, MS-100, MS-101
* Any Certification and working knowledge of ITIL, Service Management and Integration, Automation Artificial Intelligence and Analytics

**Experience required:**

* 5+ years of experience in enterprise architecture and pre-sales activities, with a focus on collaboration technologies from Microsoft and Cisco
* Demonstratable experience designing, implementing, managing Microsoft Teams or Cisco Webex cloud solutions with telephony integrations.
* Experience selling managed services and a strong understanding of managed services concepts, including Service Level Agreements (SLAs), service delivery, and service management.
* Experience working in a Telecoms Partner or managed service provider delivering voice and video-based enterprise global solutions and services.

**Skills Summary**


Functional Requirements, Software Development, Solution Architecture**What will make you a good fit for the role?**

**Workplace type****:**

**Equal Opportunity Employer**


NTT is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer with a global culture that embraces diversity. We are committed to providing an environment free of unfair discrimination and harassment. We do not discriminate based on age, race, color, sex, religion, national origin, disability, pregnancy, marital status, sexual orientation, gender reassignment, veteran status, or other protected category

 **Join our growing global team and accelerate your career with us. Apply today.**

 **A career at NTT means:**

* Being part of a **global pioneer –** where you gain exposure to our Fortune 500 clients and world-leading global technology partners and work with a network of over 40,000 smart and diverse colleagues across 57 countries, delivering services in over 200 countries.
* Being at the forefront of **cutting-edge technology –** backed with a 150-year heritage of using technology for good. With 40% of the world’s internet traffic running on our network and where Emoji were first invented, you can be proud of the group’s many new ‘firsts’.
* **Making a difference –** by doing meaningful work that helps to shape the future for our clients, and across industries and communities around the world.
* Being **your best self –** in a progressive ‘Connected Working’ environment that promotes flexibility, connection and wellbeing. Where diversity and different perspectives are embraced to ensure equal opportunities for all.
* Having ongoing opportunities to **own and develop your career –** with a personal and professional development plan and access to the broadest learning offerings in the industry.

title: Senior Risk Analyst
description:
**Line of Service**

Advisory
**Industry/Sector**

Not Applicable
**Specialism**

Data, Analytics & AI
**Management Level**

Associate
**Job Description & Summary**

A career within Data and Analytics services will provide you with the opportunity to help organisations uncover enterprise insights and drive business results using smarter data analytics. We focus on a collection of organisational technology capabilities, including business intelligence, data management, and data assurance that help our clients drive innovation, growth, and change within their organisations in order to keep up with the changing nature of customers and technology. We make impactful decisions by mixing mind and machine to leverage data, understand and navigate risk, and help our clients gain a competitive edge.
  

  

Our team helps clients navigate various analytics applications to get the most value out of their technology investment and foster confidence in their business intelligence. As part of our team, you'll help our clients implement enterprise content and data management applications that improve operational effectiveness and provide impactful data analytics and insights.
To really stand out and make us fit for the future in a constantly changing world, each and every one of us at PwC needs to be a purpose-led and values-driven leader at every level. To help us achieve this we have the PwC Professional; our global leadership development framework. It gives us a single set of expectations across our lines, geographies and career paths, and provides transparency on the skills we need as individuals to be successful and progress in our careers, now and in the future.


As an Associate, you'll work as part of a team of problem solvers, helping to solve complex business issues from strategy to execution. PwC Professional skills and responsibilities for this management level include but are not limited to:


* Invite and give in the moment feedback in a constructive manner.
* Share and collaborate effectively with others.
* Identify and make suggestions for improvements when problems and/or opportunities arise.
* Handle, manipulate and analyse data and information responsibly.
* Follow risk management and compliance procedures.
* Keep up-to-date with developments in area of specialism.
* Communicate confidently in a clear, concise and articulate manner - verbally and in the materials I produce.
* Build and maintain an internal and external network.
* Seek opportunities to learn about how PwC works as a global network of firms.
* Uphold the firm's code of ethics and business conduct.

The role would primarily be focused primarily on working on Security Configuration of a Salesforce Org and secondarily on Salesforce Org Security Assessments.


Working as a Associate, expected to work in a team of 8-12 people for multiple projects in the area of Security Configuration for Salesforce.


The various tasks include:


* Leveraging Salesforce Shield (Platform Encryption, Audit Trails, Event Monitoring & Einstein Data Detect)
* Implement Data Masking, Security & privacy framework for the applications
* Apart from configuration candidate should be good in customization which includes Apex, Aura and Lightning Web Components
* Good to have cross platform integration experience
* Implementing SSO, Encryption, Auth. Providers and Authorization protocols

**Knowledge Preferred:**

* Extensive experience in Force.com platform using APEX and Visualforce
* SOQL,SOSL
* Must have Field service Lightning tool configuration experience.
* Experience with SFDX, Aura, Git, REST, and Middleware/ETL/ESB is highly preferred.
* Salesforce Platform App Builder, Platform Developer 1, Administrator certifications.
* Experience with VS Code, JSON, HTML, CSS, Ajax, JavaScript , JQuery.
* Experience with Gitlab/GitHub/Bitbucket, and SDLC
* Experience with Systems Integrations through Apex

* Demonstrates thorough knowledge of the design, implementation, and/or assessment of Security, including a significant understanding of the systems implementation lifecycle, including configuring and optimizing business process controls and application security.
* Demonstrates thorough understanding of business processes related to Salesforce.
* Able to handle data management inclusive of data load, data translation, data hygiene, data migration and integration.
* Proven ability to look at technical processes from a strategic standpoint and understand the inter-relationships

**Capability:**

* Demonstrates thorough ability to adapt a work program and practice aid, as well as perform assessments, using PwC's proprietary or other relevant tools to evaluate controls, security, SOD, and potential for optimization.
* Demonstrates thorough abilities to identify and address client needs, including developing and sustaining meaningful client relationships and understanding of the client's business.
* Demonstrates thorough knowledge of designing and execution of test scripts for Salesforce Business Process

**Experience:**

* 2-5 years of experience in the domains mentioned in the Job Description above
* Experience of Sales/Service/Digital Interaction Cloud implementation would be beneficial.

**Education:**

Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering or Management Information Systems or Masters in Computer Applications. Post-graduate certification like CA/MBA etc. Would be an added bonus.

title: IT Engineer
description:
**Job Summary**

As a member of the Data Center Services Operation team, the Operations Engineer will be responsible for carrying out activities that combine analytical and design skills with adequate knowledge of software and hardware technology to define, design, implement, test, deploy, and modify Emerson's VMware/Virtualization, Storage, Data Protection, Windows, and Linux infrastructure to produce and implement functional solutions that meet predefined requirements or organizational needs. This person will also be responsible for administering, monitoring, maintaining performance, ensuring security, applying patches, and fixing the infrastructure


* Installing, configuring, and maintaining hardware, operating systems, and software applications on servers. Supporting VMware/Virtualization, Cloud, Storage, Data Protection, Windows, and Linux infrastructure, including all related administration aspects.
* Performing periodic system maintenance tasks, including software updates, patches, and firmware upgrades.
* Monitoring system performance, resource utilization, and capacity planning.
* Resolving hardware and software issues in a timely manner.
* Performing periodic patching and applying appropriate security updates.
* Establishing and adhering to backup and disaster recovery procedures.
* Work on multiple cloud environment (Microsoft Azure, Oracle Cloud etc.) to manage infrastructure.
* Managing user accounts, permissions, and access control.
* Providing technical support and assistance in troubleshooting customer issues.
* Evaluating and recommending system upgrades, new technologies, and software/hardware solutions.
* Planning and implementing system migrations, integrations, and expansions.
* Collaborating with vendors and IT team members to implement new systems and technologies.
* Creating and maintaining documentation, including system configurations, procedures, and troubleshooting guides.
* Generating reports on system performance, incidents, and security events.
* Collaborating with other IT team members, such as network administrators, database administrators, and developers.
* Keeping up-to-date knowledge of emerging technologies, trends, and standard methodologies in system administration.
* Ensuring compliance with company audit and security policies and procedures.
* Developing and implementing scripts and automation tools for repetitive administrative tasks.
* Automating system maintenance tasks and monitoring processes.
* Improving system efficiency and productivity through scripting and automation.
* Diagnosing and resolving hardware and software issues for VMware/Virtualization, Storage, Data Protection, Windows, and Linux infrastructure.
* Supporting x86 blade servers and rack-mountable servers. Installing, fixing, and replacing hardware and firmware as needed.
* Advancing complex issues to the appropriate teams or vendors when necessary.
* Using change and incident management systems to ensure enterprise-level system availability.
* Performing any other tasks assigned by the direct supervisor or management related to job responsibilities or legal compliance.

You show a tremendous amount of initiative in tough situations; are exceptional at spotting and seizing opportunities. You observe situational and group dynamics and select best-fit approach. You make implementation plans that allocate resources precisely. You pursue everything with energy, drive, and the need to finish.


**For This Role, You Will Need:**

* 4+ year of demonstrated ability in **Windows server administration,** including installation, configuration, and maintenance of Windows servers (Windows Server 2012, 2016, 2019,2022) with specialized knowledge and practical experience in **Cloud Services** and Software-Defined Data Center (SDDC) environments.
* Demonstrated expertise in **Citrix virtualization solutions** , including practical experience with Citrix App and Desktop for application and desktop virtualization.
* Familiarity with **cloud services** such as virtual machines, storage, networking, identity, and access management (IAM), and monitoring services in cloud platforms.
* Demonstrated expertise in cloud platforms such as **Microsoft Azure, Oracle Cloud Infrastructure** including practical experience with provisioning, configuring, monitoring, and troubleshooting resources in cloud environments.
* Experience with **PowerShell scripting for automation and management** of Windows environments.
* Hands-on experience with cloud monitoring, logging, and performance tuning tools.
* Experience working in an operational IT environment that applies ticketing and problem management systems (e.g., ServiceNow, Jira) for incident and changes.
* Experience working in an operational IT environment that applies ticketing and problem management systems (e.g., ServiceNow, Jira) for incident and changes.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to solve complex technical issues in a Windows and cloud environment.
* Superb communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team-oriented environment.

**Preferred Qualifications that Set You Apart:**

* Certification(s) in cloud technologies (e.g., Oracle Cloud Infrastructure, Microsoft Certified: Azure Administrator, AWS Certified Solutions Architect) and/or Windows server administration (e.g., Microsoft Certified: Windows Server) is a plus.
* Knowledge of hybrid cloud architectures and solutions for integrating on-premises and cloud environments.

Through our benefits, development opportunities, and an inclusive and safe work environment, we aim to create an organization our people are proud to represent.


Our Commitment to Diversity & Inclusion


At Emerson, we are committed to fostering a culture where every employee is valued and respected for their unique experiences and perspectives. We believe a diverse and inclusive work environment contributes to the rich exchange of ideas and diversity of thoughts, that inspires innovation and brings the best solutions to our customers.


This philosophy is fundamental to living our company’s values and our responsibility to leave the world in a better place. Learn more about our Culture & Values and about Diversity, Equity & Inclusion at Emerson.

**WHY EMERSON**

**At Emerson, we are motivated by a spirit of collaboration that helps our diverse, multicultural teams across the world drive innovation that makes the world healthier, safer, smarter, and more sustainable. And we want you to join us in our bold aspiration.**

**We have built an engaged community of inquisitive, dedicated people who thrive knowing they are welcomed, trusted, celebrated, and empowered to solve the world’s most complex problems — for our customers, our communities, and the planet. You’ll contribute to this vital work while further developing your skills through our award-winning employee development programs. We are a proud corporate citizen in every city where we operate and are committed to our people, our communities, and the world at large. We take this responsibility seriously and strive to make a positive impact through every endeavor.**

**At Emerson, you’ll see firsthand that our people are at the center of everything we do. So, let’s go. Let’s think differently. Learn, collaborate, and grow. Seek opportunity. Push boundaries. Be empowered to make things better. Speed up to break through. Let’s go, together.**

**Accessibility Assistance or Accommodation**

**If you have a disability and are having difficulty accessing or using this website to apply for a position, please contact:** **idisability.administrator@emerson.com** **.**

**ABOUT EMERSON**

**Emerson is a global leader in automation technology and software. Through our deep domain expertise and legacy of flawless execution, Emerson helps customers in critical industries like life sciences, energy, power and renewables, chemical and advanced factory automation operate more sustainably while improving productivity, energy security and reliability.**

**With global operations and a comprehensive portfolio of software and technology, we are helping companies implement digital transformation to measurably improve their operations, conserve valuable resources and enhance their safety.**

**We offer equitable opportunities, celebrate diversity, and embrace challenges with confidence that, together, we can make an impact across a broad spectrum of countries and industries. Whether you’re an established professional looking for a career change, an undergraduate student exploring possibilities, or a recent graduate with an advanced degree, you’ll find your chance to make a difference with Emerson. Join our team – let’s go!**

**No calls or agencies please.**

title: Senior Risk Analyst
description:
**Line of Service**

Advisory
**Industry/Sector**

Not Applicable
**Specialism**

Data, Analytics & AI
**Management Level**

Associate
**Job Description & Summary**

A career within Data and Analytics services will provide you with the opportunity to help organisations uncover enterprise insights and drive business results using smarter data analytics. We focus on a collection of organisational technology capabilities, including business intelligence, data management, and data assurance that help our clients drive innovation, growth, and change within their organisations in order to keep up with the changing nature of customers and technology. We make impactful decisions by mixing mind and machine to leverage data, understand and navigate risk, and help our clients gain a competitive edge.
  

  

Our team helps clients navigate various analytics applications to get the most value out of their technology investment and foster confidence in their business intelligence. As part of our team, you'll help our clients implement enterprise content and data management applications that improve operational effectiveness and provide impactful data analytics and insights.
To really stand out and make us fit for the future in a constantly changing world, each and every one of us at PwC needs to be a purpose-led and values-driven leader at every level. To help us achieve this we have the PwC Professional; our global leadership development framework. It gives us a single set of expectations across our lines, geographies and career paths, and provides transparency on the skills we need as individuals to be successful and progress in our careers, now and in the future.


As an Associate, you'll work as part of a team of problem solvers, helping to solve complex business issues from strategy to execution. PwC Professional skills and responsibilities for this management level include but are not limited to:


* Invite and give in the moment feedback in a constructive manner.
* Share and collaborate effectively with others.
* Identify and make suggestions for improvements when problems and/or opportunities arise.
* Handle, manipulate and analyse data and information responsibly.
* Follow risk management and compliance procedures.
* Keep up-to-date with developments in area of specialism.
* Communicate confidently in a clear, concise and articulate manner - verbally and in the materials I produce.
* Build and maintain an internal and external network.
* Seek opportunities to learn about how PwC works as a global network of firms.
* Uphold the firm's code of ethics and business conduct.

The role would primarily be focused primarily on working on Security Configuration of a Salesforce Org and secondarily on Salesforce Org Security Assessments.


Working as a Associate, expected to work in a team of 8-12 people for multiple projects in the area of Security Configuration for Salesforce.


The various tasks include:


* Leveraging Salesforce Shield (Platform Encryption, Audit Trails, Event Monitoring & Einstein Data Detect)
* Implement Data Masking, Security & privacy framework for the applications
* Apart from configuration candidate should be good in customization which includes Apex, Aura and Lightning Web Components
* Good to have cross platform integration experience
* Implementing SSO, Encryption, Auth. Providers and Authorization protocols

**Knowledge Preferred:**

* Extensive experience in Force.com platform using APEX and Visualforce
* SOQL,SOSL
* Must have Field service Lightning tool configuration experience.
* Experience with SFDX, Aura, Git, REST, and Middleware/ETL/ESB is highly preferred.
* Salesforce Platform App Builder, Platform Developer 1, Administrator certifications.

Experience with VS Code, JSON, HTML, CSS, Ajax, JavaScript , JQuery


* Experience with Gitlab/GitHub/Bitbucket, and SDLC
* Experience with Systems Integrations through Apex
* Demonstrates thorough knowledge of the design, implementation, and/or assessment of Security, including a significant understanding of the systems implementation lifecycle, including configuring and optimizing business process controls and application security.
* Demonstrates thorough understanding of business processes related to Salesforce.
* Able to handle data management inclusive of data load, data translation, data hygiene, data migration and integration.
* Proven ability to look at technical processes from a strategic standpoint and understand the inter-relationships

**Capability:**

* Demonstrates thorough ability to adapt a work program and practice aid, as well as perform assessments, using PwC's proprietary or other relevant tools to evaluate controls, security, SOD, and potential for optimization.
* Demonstrates thorough abilities to identify and address client needs, including developing and sustaining meaningful client relationships and understanding of the client's business.
* Demonstrates thorough knowledge of designing and execution of test scripts for Salesforce Business Process

**Experience:**

* 2-5 years of experience in the domains mentioned in the Job Description above
* Experience of Sales/Service/Digital Interaction Cloud implementation would be beneficial.

**Education:**

Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering or Management Information Systems or Masters in Computer Applications. Post-graduate certification like CA/MBA etc. Would be an added bonus.

title: Network Administrator
description:
**Job Profile: System and Network Administrator**

Location: Vashi, Navi Mumbai

Qualification: Any Graduate

Experience : Minimum 6 Years Relevant experience.

Salary: As per Industry and Experience.

Contract Term-up: Minimum 2 Year

**Share CV: sunilkumar@opelox.com / HR@opelox.com**

**Contact No. : 9892955033 / 7977264761**

**Key Responsibilities:**

**Server Administration**

1. Server Deployment and Configuration:

* Deploy, configure, and maintain server hardware, operating systems, and associated

software.

* Install and update server software, patches, and security updates as necessary.
* Set up and manage virtualization technologies (e.g., VMware, Hyper-V) if applicable.

2. System Monitoring and Performance Optimization:

* Monitor server performance, resource utilization, and network connectivity to identify and resolve issues promptly.
* Conduct system performance tuning and optimization to ensure efficient operation and

response times.

* Implement load balancing and failover mechanisms for high availability and reliability.

3. Security and Data Protection:

* Implement and maintain robust security measures to safeguard servers and data from

unauthorized access, viruses, and malware.

* Create and enforce server access controls, user accounts, and permissions.
* Conduct regular backups and ensure data integrity to prevent data loss.

4. Troubleshooting and Issue Resolution:

* Respond to server-related incidents and problems, troubleshoot root causes, and resolve

issues within defined service level agreements (SLAs).

* Collaborate with other IT teams to diagnose and address complex technical problems.

5. Disaster Recovery and Business Continuity:

* Develop and maintain disaster recovery plans and procedures for server systems.
* Participate in disaster recovery drills and testing to validate the effectiveness of recovery

plans.

6. Documentation and Reporting:

* Maintain comprehensive documentation of server configurations, changes, and procedures.
* Generate regular reports on server performance, capacity, and incidents for management

review.

7. Automation and Scripting:

* Leverage automation tools and scripting languages to streamline repetitive tasks and

improve efficiency.

8. System Upgrades and Technology Evaluation:

* Plan and execute server hardware and software upgrades as necessary to keep systems up-to-date.
* Evaluate new server technologies and make recommendations for their implementation.

9. Collaboration and Knowledge Sharing:

* Collaborate with IT teams and stakeholders to understand business needs and align server systems accordingly.
* Share knowledge and provide training to other team members when necessary.

**Network Administration**

1. Network Infrastructure Management:

* Design, configure, and maintain the organization's local area network (LAN) and wide area

network (WAN).

* Install, configure, and manage network devices, including routers, switches, firewalls, and

access points.

* Monitor network performance, availability, and security to proactively identify and resolve

issues.

2. Network Security:

* Implement and enforce security policies, protocols, and procedures to protect the

organization's network and data.

* Configure and manage firewalls, intrusion detection/prevention systems (IDS/IPS), and

virtual private networks (VPNs).

* Conduct regular security audits and vulnerability assessments to identify and remediate

potential weaknesses.

3. Access Control and Authentication:

* Set up and manage user access controls and authentication mechanisms to ensure proper

data protection.

* Maintain and regularly review user accounts, permissions, and access rights.

4. Incident Response and Threat Management:

* Monitor network traffic and security alerts for signs of potential security breaches or

unauthorized access.

* Respond to security incidents, conduct forensic analysis, and take appropriate actions to

mitigate risks.

* Stay informed about the latest security threats and vulnerabilities to proactively protect the network.

5. Network Performance Optimization:

* Analyse network traffic patterns and optimize network performance and efficiency.
* Implement Quality of Service (QoS) policies to prioritize critical network traffic.

6. Network Backup and Recovery:

* Establish and maintain network backup and recovery processes to ensure data continuity.
* Conduct regular backup tests and validate data integrity.

7. Network Documentation and Reporting:

* Maintain accurate and up-to-date documentation of the network infrastructure,

configurations, and security procedures.

* Generate reports on network performance, security incidents, and compliance status.

8. Vendor Management:

* Collaborate with vendors to procure network and security-related products and services.
* Manage vendor relationships and contracts effectively.

9. Training and User Support:

* Provide training and support to end-users on network access and security best practices.
* Assist users in resolving network connectivity and security-related issues.

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent

Salary: From ₹18,000.00 per month

Experience:

* total work: 1 year (Preferred)

Ability to Commute:

* Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra (Required)

Ability to Relocate:

* Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra: Relocate before starting work (Required)

Work Location: In person

title: Application Support Engineer
description:
**JOB DESCRIPTION**  

This position is for a Senior SAP Basis Administrator, for the Global SAP ECC 6.0 System which is used as the Domestic Ledger system and SAP BW 7.x on NetWeaver platform is used for reporting. The SAP Senior Basis Administrator is responsible for the management of the SAP environment and integration with external application components. He / she responsible to configure, monitor, recommend and tune the SAP Application components to ensure every integration layers (ABAP, DB, Network, Storage & Backup Layer) are fully functional based on business requirements. The SAP Basis Administrator is responsible for the installation, upgrade, and maintenance of SAP systems. Additional areas include the evaluation and design of interfaces, between SAP and external systems, maintenance of the SAP Data Dictionary and database objects, and manage the migration of SAP database and application configuration from development to production systems.

**JPMorgan Chase & Co. (NYSE: JPM) is a leading global financial services firm with assets of trillion and operations in more than 60 countries. The firm is a leader in investment banking, financial services for consumers, small business and commercial banking, financial transaction processing, asset management, and private equity.**  



**Responsibilities and duties:**

* Daily administration, monitoring, troubleshooting, and tuning of SAP ECC 6.0, S/4 HANA, B4 HANA on HANA 2.0 platform with GRC or SOLUTION MANAGER integration
* Perform SAP software installation, upgrades, applying support packages, system copies/refreshes and installation add-on software components.
* Responding to and resolving infrastructure related incidents & problems
* Works with OS & DB Administrators for optimal SAP Performance
* Provide Support and Guidance to the other Project and Development teams during the build and QA cycle testing
* Provides local and remote site resiliency recovery processes across multiple SAP products to meet cyber resiliency requirements
* Provide all technical support to monitor proactively during critical processing period
* Perform system analysis across multiple layers and provide recommended approaches to improve system performance.
* Participate in multi-landscape design solutions, architecture recommendations, and strategies for continuous improvement.
* Maintain multi-landscape environments through remote copies, system refreshes, and transport management monitoring.
* Provide daily business process support for all the integrations from and to the SAP ECC, S/4 HANA. B4HANA and GRC applications and ensure all components are fully functional at all times
* Perform Daily System Health Checks on all SAP systems and do general troubleshooting and diagnostics checks on technical aspects of the system.
* Configure and Maintain Transport System Landscapes and operate Change Management Tools
* Provide Production Support 24x7 support with on-call responsibilities
* Work with SAP via OSS & Solution Manager to technical resolve problems

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science or related business field: or equivalent experience.
* Working understanding of complex software and information technology solutions.
* 12-15+ years working with SAP administration with demonstrated experience related to support, maintenance, and implementation projects.
* 8+ years’ experience with UNIX or LINUX platform preferably AIX 7.X or RHEL 8.X / 9.X operating systems
* 4 -5+ years of HANA 2.0 experience to support multi landscape system
* Able to work independently as well as coordinate with business and technical teams
* Good working knowledge using bash shell Scripting or python scripting will be value added but not essential
* Certified in any of the cloud platforms (AWS / AZURE / GCP / internal cloud solutions with third parties)
* Ability to mentor and provide technical guidance to internal and external teams




**Desired technologies:**

S/4 HANA FP01/FP02 and B4 HANA with NetWeaver integration components (Web dispatcher, LDAP-plugins, SNC, SSO and SPNEGO) on RHEL / SUSE LINUX platform, ECC 6.0 on AIX 7.3 with Oracle 19c database. Experience on the IBM Power Platform with any cloud technologies (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud and other vendor-based cloud solutions)


**ABOUT US**  

JPMorgan Chase & Co., one of the oldest financial institutions, offers innovative financial solutions to millions of consumers, small businesses and many of the world’s most prominent corporate, institutional and government clients under the J.P. Morgan and Chase brands. Our history spans over 200 years and today we are a leader in investment banking, consumer and small business banking, commercial banking, financial transaction processing and asset management.  

  

We recognize that our people are our strength and the diverse talents they bring to our global workforce are directly linked to our success. We are an equal opportunity employer and place a high value on diversity and inclusion at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of any protected attribute, including race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital or veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. We also make reasonable accommodations for applicants’ and employees’ religious practices and beliefs, as well as mental health or physical disability needs. Visit our FAQs for more information about requesting an accommodation.

  

  

  

**ABOUT THE TEAM**  

  

Our Corporate Technology team relies on smart, driven people like you to develop applications and provide tech support for all our corporate functions across our network. Your efforts will touch lives all over the financial spectrum and across all our divisions: Global Finance, Corporate Treasury, Risk Management, Human Resources, Compliance, Legal, and within the Corporate Administrative Office. You’ll be part of a team specifically built to meet and exceed our evolving technology needs, as well as our technology controls agenda.

Roles & Responsibilities: Linux administrator responsible for deployment, configuration, maintenance, monitoring, and overall support of Redhat Linux environments. • Good knowledge on Linux Patching • Performance tuning , OS hardening • Knowledge on Change creation process and approval • Setup, install, configure, perform post build validations as per the requirements. • Develop and Document the procedural operations for Linux system builds • Participate in Disaster Recovery planning and DR exercises. - Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to Linux Operations. Professional & Technical Skills: - Must To Have Skills: Strong experience in Linux Operations. - Good To Have Skills: Unix Architecture and Design, Linux. - Experience in providing hardware/software support and implementing technology at the operating system-level. - Experience in troubleshooting and resolving issues related to Linux Operations. - Strong collaboration and communication skills. - Solid understanding of server and network areas. Additional Information: - The candidate should have a minimum of 3 years of experience in Linux Operations. - The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful solutions. - This position is based at our Bengaluru office.


  

15 Years Regular Education

title: Senior Network Administrator
description:
**What You’ll Do:**  

Responsible to oversee technical requirement of Cloud Network & Datacenter operations , reviewing on going operations & rectifying the issues.
  
  

Responsible to work on Technical Escalations, technical trainings, Smooth operations.
  
  

Organize teams, distribute work and monitor progress, quality assurance, and performance, in a multidisciplinary team environment.
  
  

Managing Cloud network solutions, Network components & Network connectivity as per Target architecture and customer standards to meet connectivity requirements of Teradata customers.
  
Manage, Operate and Support 24x7 AWS environments for multiple customers.
  
  

Candidate will be taking care of network performance, availability, utilization, throughput, and latency. Wil also be responsible for defining network policies and procedures; establishing connections and firewalls (Palo Alto, F5 , ACI, Cisco Route & switches ).
  
  

Perform a wide range of cloud administration duties on core infrastructure, application, all 3 Cloud Provider network troubleshooting, security, data protection and optimization.
  
  

Candidate will be directly working with customers to make sure network is stable, performance is good & they are getting good throughput.
  
  

**Who You’ll Work With:**  

Managed Cloud Network team is responsible to take care of Teradata Cloud Customers Network, we manage complete network infrastructure & network components & keep overall infrastructure healthy.
  
  

This team is responsible to take care of Public Cloud , Private Cloud & Teradata datacenter operations.
  
  

This position will directly report to Cloud Ops Manager.
  
  

**What Makes You a Qualified Candidate:**  

8+ years of extensive hands-on cloud networking and troubleshooting experience in large, distributed products of experience working in Public Cloud and Cloud Networking.
  
  

Should have CCNA & one Cloud Associate level certification (AWS /Azure/ GCP).
  
  

Good understanding of OSI Model, TCP/IP Suite & network troubleshooting skills are expected.
  
  

Extensive knowledge of basic cloud networking for example TCP/IP, VLAN/VXLAN, VRF, QoS, BGP, OSPF, EIGRP as well as MPLS connectivity/architecture.
  
  

Deep working knowledge of networking technologies including Layer-2,Layer-3 protocols, routing and switching products. ,BGP, MPLS, STP, RSVP-TE.
  
  

Basic Understand & Knowledge of Load balancer , Network Firewall, DNS, Network monitoring tools, Wireshark/Packet Capture tools is good to have.
  
  

Handson experience in Cloud Network connectivity like Hub & Spoke technologies, Virtual Network Gateways, VPN, Direct Connect , Vnet Peering & Private link , VPC peering ,express route, transit gateway.
  
  

**Thorough understanding of Cloud Computing:** virtualization technologies, Infrastructure as a Service, Platform as a Service and Software as a Service Cloud delivery models and the current competitive landscape
  
  

**What You’ll Bring:**  

Good organizational and time management skills to work on multiple tasks/projects simultaneously.
  
  

Good experience working in a Support/Technical Assistance Centre (TAC) team.
  
  

Knowledge of IaaS, PaaS, SaaS along with Private, Public and Hybrid Cloud technologies
  
  

Experience in deploying and implementing scalable cloud-based solution architectures for PaaS, IaaS or SaaS with Azure cloud technologies. Ability to work in collaboration with product
  
  

development engineering teams.
  
  

Should have good exposure to establishing architecture strategies, processes, standards & governance policies on Cloud Environment and implementation of the same.
  
  

A passion for improving processes and a commitment to customer satisfaction.
  
  

Strong analytical & problem-solving skills, Strategic thinker, ability to see big picture and develop roadmaps.
  
  

Excellent written and verbal communication skills and ability to lead and mentor.
  
  

Results oriented team player who will work towards meeting team commitments and ability to work within a cross-functional team.
  
  

Strong understanding of IT production environments, operational strategies and mission critical systems to include IT internal controls and regulatory compliance.

title: Systems Administrator
description:
**No. of Positions** : 1



**Total Relevant Experience** : 2 to 5 Years



**Education** : Certifications such as CompTIA Linux+, Red Hat Certified Engineer (RHCE), or Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA).



**Job Description**


* Install, configure, and maintain Linux servers and workstations.
* Monitor system performance, identify bottlenecks, and optimize system resources.
* Administer user accounts, access controls, and permissions.
* Handle software installations, updates, and patches.
* Networking Infrastructure Management.
* Implement and enforce security measures to protect the network from unauthorized access, cyber threats, and malware.
* Monitor network traffic for suspicious activities and take appropriate actions when needed.
* Maintain firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and other security appliances.
* Network Protocols and Services
* Proficiently work with TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, VLANs, VPNs, and other network protocols and services.
* Configure and manage network services such as DNS, DHCP, NTP, and LDAP.
* Backup and Disaster Recovery
* Set up and maintain backup strategies to safeguard critical data.
* Develop and execute disaster recovery plans to ensure business continuity.
* Collaborate and Support: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to provide technical support for various projects.
* Assist other IT teams and end-users with Linux and networking-related queries.


**Required Skills**


* Proven experience as a Linux Administrator with a strong emphasis on networking.
* Solid knowledge of Linux operating systems (e.g., Oracle Linux,Alma Linux, Ubuntu, Red Hat) and command-line tools.
* In-depth understanding of network protocols, routing, and subnetting.
* Familiarity with network hardware and software, including routers, switches, firewalls, and VPNs.
* Experience with network monitoring and troubleshooting tools.
* Ability to handle and prioritize multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment.
* Certifications such as CompTIA Linux+, Red Hat Certified Engineer (RHCE), or Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA).
* Rotation Shift

title: Server Administrator
description:
**Responsibilities:**

* **Capacity Planning**: Designing deployment architecture and assess resource requirements for capacity planning in coordination with the application development team for on-premises and Azure.
* **Resource Deployment**: Deploy and maintain Azure virtual machines (VMs), virtual networks, storage, and other Azure resources.
* **Security:** Implement and enforce security policies, access controls.
* **Identity and Access Management:**Administer Azure Active Directory, including user and group management, Role-based Access Control, Patch Management, and Single Sign-On (SSO) configuration.
* **Performance Monitoring and Optimization**: Set up monitoring, alerts, and logging to proactively identify and resolve performance issues. Optimize resource utilization and cost management.
* **Backup and Disaster Recovery:**Implement data backup and recovery strategies, including Azure Backup and Azure Site Recovery.
* **Networking:**Configure and maintain networks & VPNs for secure and efficient data transmission.
* **Troubleshooting:**Identify and resolve issue on on-premises server, network, and Azure.

* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, MCA, or equivalent.
* Good knowledge on Server Infrastructure and Networking
* Experience in Azure Administration
* Good knowledge of major Azure services such as Azure VMs, Azure PostgreSQL Database, Azure Active Directory, Azure Security Centre, and Azure Networking.
* Command in scripting and automation using PowerShell or Azure CLI.
* Microsoft Certification: Azure Administrator Associate.
* Knowledge on Azure DevOps, CI/CD pipelines, and source control (e.g., Git).
* Knowledge of cloud security best practices and compliance standards (e.g., ISO 27001)
